scripts.install-node: nvm install 15.5.0 && nvm install 14.15.3 && nvm install 12.22.12 && nvm install 10.24.1
scripts.benchmark-all: npm run benchmark-classes && npm run benchmark-pojos -p high
scripts.benchmark-all-medium: npm run benchmark-classes && npm run benchmark-pojos -p medium
scripts.benchmark-all-low: npm run benchmark-classes && npm run benchmark-pojos -p low
